title: Patolu
medium: Silk and silver-metal-strip-wrapped silk, stripes of warp and weft resist dyed (double ikat), plain weave, stripes of weft resist dyed (weft ikat), plain weave , bands of plain weave and bands of open warps; plied and knotted main warp fringe
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of E. M. Bakwin Indonesian Textile Collection
